trans-unit.source: Waikato District Health Board (DHB) is one of 20 district health boards in New Zealand,
trans-unit.target: La Waikato District Health Board (DHB) es uno de los 20 de consejos de salud de distrito en Nueva Zelanda,

trans-unit.source: employing more than 6,500 people to plan, fund and provide hospital, health and disability
trans-unit.target: empleando a más de 6,500 personas para planear, fundar y brindar servicios hospitalarios, de salud y discapacidad

trans-unit.source: services to the more than 375,000 people, either directly or by funding and contracting
trans-unit.target: a más de 375,000 personas, ya sea directamente o fundando o contratando

trans-unit.source: other providers. It includes a tertiary hospital, a secondary hospital, three rural
trans-unit.target: a otros proveedores. Incluye un hospital de tercer nivel, un hospital de segundo nivel, tres hospitales rurales

trans-unit.source: hospitals and it also offers a wide range of community-based and health promotion services.
trans-unit.target: y también ofrece una amplia variedad de servicios basados en la comunidad y de promoción de la salud.

trans-unit.source: The Waikato DHB provides tertiary services (such as neurosurgery and other highly complex
trans-unit.target: La Waikato DHB brinda servicios de tercer nivel (como neurocirugía, y otras cirugías altamente complejas,

trans-unit.source: surgery, specialised medical procedures and specialist trauma services) to a Midland health
trans-unit.target: procedimientos médicos especializados y servicios de traumatología) a la
población de la región de salud de Midland de más de 850,000.

trans-unit.source: to virtualize healthcare by providing immediate access to a top-quality New Zealand-based
trans-unit.target: para virtualizar la atención a la salud brindando acceso inmediato al mejor servicio de salud

trans-unit.source: health service. The groundbreaking partnership is creating fundamental improvements in
trans-unit.target: basado en Nueva Zelanda. La asociación pionera está creando mejoras fundamentales en

trans-unit.source: clinical service delivery to the population through enhanced care and service, advanced
trans-unit.target: la entrega de servicio clínico a la población a través de atención y servicio mejorado, avanzada

trans-unit.source: health education, seamless medical communications, and advanced clinical engagement tools.
trans-unit.target: educación en salud, impecables comunicaciones médicas, y avanzadas herramientas de participación clínica.

trans-unit.source: “We want citizen-centric healthcare that is at the patient’s convenience
trans-unit.target: “Queremos atención a la salud centrada en el ciudadano que esté a la conveniencia del paciente

trans-unit.source: and delivered in their community, closer to home. Every citizen at some
trans-unit.target: y entregada en su comunidad, más cerca de casa. Cada ciudadano en cierto

trans-unit.source: point will become a patient, and they should have agency, control, and a
trans-unit.target: punto se convertirá en un paciente, y deberá tener agencia, control y una

trans-unit.source: voice in the way care is delivered and received.
trans-unit.target: voz en la forma en la que la atención es dada y recibida.

trans-unit.source: Access is vital. We believe high-quality care, provided conveniently and cost-effectively,
trans-unit.target: El acceso es vital. Creemos que la atención de alta calidad, brindada convenientemente y económicamente,

trans-unit.source: is our citizens’ fundamental human right, removing boundaries and inequalities. With our
trans-unit.target: es un derecho fundamental de nuestros ciudadanos, removiendo barreras y desigualdades. Con nuestro

trans-unit.source: new virtual health service, powered by HealthTap's HOPESTM, we can deliver the highest-quality
trans-unit.target: nuevo servicio virtual de salud, impulsado por HOPESTM de HealthTap, podemos brindar la más alta calidad

trans-unit.source: care at a lower cost. This is not incremental software implementation. We are embarking on a
trans-unit.target: de atención a un menor costo. Esto no es una implementación incremental de software. Estamos emprendiendo una

trans-unit.source: clinical service revolution that will provide ubiquitous access to our citizens and empower
trans-unit.target: revolución en el servicio clínico que brindará acceso ubicuo a nuestros ciudadanos e impulsará

trans-unit.source: our doctors and other health professionals through global collaboration, greater convenience,
trans-unit.target: a nuestros doctores y otros profesionales de la salud a través de colaboración global, mayor conveniencia,

trans-unit.source: and increased flexibility. With the Waikato-HealthTap partnership, more than one million
trans-unit.target: y flexibilidad aumentada. Con la asosiación Waikato-HealthTap, más de un millón

trans-unit.source: New Zealand citizens will be able to live happier and healthier lives.”
trans-unit.target: de ciudadanos de Nueva Zelanda serán capaces de vivir vidas más felices y saludables.”

trans-unit.source: — Dr. Nigel Murray, CEO of Waikato District Health Board
trans-unit.target: — Dr. Nigel Murray, CEO de la Waikato District Health Board

trans-unit.source: HealthTap and Waikato launched an integrated solution at a speed that was greatly enabled by the interoperability and agility of HOPES:
trans-unit.target: HealthTap y Waikato lanzaron una solución integrada a una velocidad que fue permitida en gran parte por la interoperabilidad y agilidad de HOPES:

trans-unit.source: Data-driven triage technology reduces costs, increases efficiency, improves health outcomes
trans-unit.target: Tecnología de triage impulsada por datos reduce costos, incrementa eficiencia, mejora resultados de salud

trans-unit.source: Flex, Fortune 500 company with 200,000 employees worldwide, was worried about ensuring the safety of their employees in Chennai after the heavy rain and subsequent flooding.
trans-unit.target: Flex, una compañía Fortune 500 con 200,000 empleados alrededor del mundo, estaba preocupada por asegurar la seguridad de sus empleados en Chennai después de una intensa lluvia e inundación subsecuente.

trans-unit.source: THE OLD WAY - COMMON PATIENT EXPERIENCE
trans-unit.target: LA VIEJA FORMA - EXPERIENCIA COMÚN DE PACIENTE
70% de visitas a la SUson innecesarias
Acceso Instantáneo a Conocimiento de Doctores

trans-unit.source: Flex (NASDAQ: FLEX) is a leading sketch-to-scale™ solutions company that designs and builds intelligent products for a connected world,
trans-unit.target: Flex (NASDAQ: FLEX) es compañía de soluciones sketch-to-scale™ líder que diseña y construye productos inteligentes para un mundo conectado,

trans-unit.source: with more than 200,000 employees (400,000 with dependents) across 40 countries. HealthTap Compass replaces the main interface employees used to access their health benefits, with single-sign-on integration to their health insurance third party administrators, health savings account, dental/vision plans, and more.
trans-unit.target: con más de 200,000 empleados (400,000 dependientes) en 40 países. HealthTap Compass reemplaza la interfaz de empleados principal usada para acceder a sus beneficios de salud, con integración single-sign-on para sus administradores de seguros médicos de tercera parte, cuenta de ahorros para la salud, planes dentales/visión, y más.

trans-unit.source: Over the last six years, HealthTap has optimized and validated how to engage more than a quarter billion consumers at scale. HealthTap brought this experience to Flex, where both companies jointly executed on an engagement strategy which included: personalized email campaigns, push notification, fliers, roadshow, raffles and competitions, mailers, office posters, cafeteria table cards, desktop wallpapers, local employee ambassadors, and more.
trans-unit.target: En los últimos 6 años, HealthTap ha optimizado y validado como comprometer más de un cuarto de billón de consumidores a escala, HealthTap trajo esta experiencia a Flex, donde ambas compañías ejecutaron conjuntamente una estrategia de compromiso que incluyó: campañas de correos electrónicos personalizados, notificaciones push, volantes, roadshows, rifas y competencias, mensajeros, posters en la oficina, tarjetas en mesas de la cafetería, fondos de escritorio, embajadores de empleados locales y más.

trans-unit.source: HealthTap Compass for Flex has already demonstrated utilization rates that are unprecedented in industry:
trans-unit.target: HealthTap Compass for Flex ya ha demostrado índices de uso que no tienen precedente en la industria:

trans-unit.source: More than what typical telemediciine providers see in one year
trans-unit.target: Más de los que los proveedores de telemedicina típicos ven en un año

trans-unit.source: More than what typical health benefit vendors see in one year
trans-unit.target: Más de los que los vendedores de beneficios de la salud ven en un año

trans-unit.source: Of eligible employees used the service
trans-unit.target: De empleados elegibles usaron el servicio

trans-unit.source: HealthTap offers more than just telemedicine.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap ofrece más que sólo telemedicina

trans-unit.target: Escoge una categoría para ver cómo es diferente.

trans-unit.target: ¡Felicidades, Avvo Health ya es parte de HealthTap!

trans-unit.source: As an Avvo user, your account has been migrated safely and securely to HealthTap. Find more doctors, answers, and trusted health information with your new, free HealthTap account.
trans-unit.target: Como un usuario Avvo, tu cuenta a migrado de forma segura a HealthTap. Encuentra más doctores, respuestas, e información confiable de salud con tu nueva cuenta gratuita HealthTap.

trans-unit.resname:
How has HealthTap impacted your life? Have you received valuable answers to pressing health questions, found doctors you love, or read health information that changed the way you approach your health? Please share your story with us.

No story is too small or too big - we love them all!
trans-unit.source:
How has HealthTap impacted your life? Have you received valuable answers to pressing health questions, found doctors you love, or read health information that changed the way you approach your health? Please share your story with us.

No story is too small or too big - we love them all!
trans-unit.target:
¿Cómo ha impactado HealthTap tu vida? ¿Has recibido valiosas respuestas para preguntas urgentes de salud, encontrado doctores que te encantan, o leído información de salud que cambió la forma en la que ves tu salud? Por favor, comparte tu historia con nosotros.

Ninguna historia es muy corta o muy larga - ¡todas nos encantan!

positively impacted your health.

trans-unit.resname: Share with a friend or loved one here.

trans-unit.resname: GUIDELINESTo ask a great HealthTap question, use these helpful guidelines
trans-unit.source: GUIDELINES To ask a great HealthTap question, use these helpful guidelines
trans-unit.target: DIRECTRICES Para hacer una pregunta a HealthTap, usa esta útil guía

trans-unit.resname:
Sweat the details... at least a little.Hide examples
Good:I had an itchy dry rash on the inside of my elbows for 3 weeks. What could be the causes?
Not so good:Why do I have a rash?
trans-unit.source:
Sweat the details... at least a little. Hide examples
Good: I had an itchy dry rash on the inside of my elbows for 3 weeks. What could be the causes?
Not so good: Why do I have a rash?
trans-unit.target:
Suda los detalles... al menos un poco. Esconder ejemplos
Bueno: Tuve un sarpullido seco con picazón en la parte interna de mis codos por 3 semanas. ¿Cuáles pueden ser las causas?
No tan bueno: ¿Por qué tengo una sarpullido?

trans-unit.resname:
Make it long enough to be helpful to others. Millions of people all over the world may read your question and its answers.Show examples
Good:What could cause low back pain after doing chores in the house – I’ve never had a back injury?
Not so good:Why back pain?
trans-unit.source:
Make it long enough to be helpful to others. Millions of people all over the world may read your question and its answers. Show examples
Good: What could cause low back pain after doing chores in the house – I’ve never had a back injury?
Not so good: Why back pain?
trans-unit.target:
Hazlo lo suficientemente largo para ayudar a otros. Millones de personas al rededor del mundo pueden leer tu pregunta y sus respuestas. Mostrar ejemplos
Bueno: ¿Qué podría causar dolor en la espalda baja después de hacer los deberes del hogar? – Nunca he tenido una lesión en la espalda baja?
No tan bueno: ¿Por qué dolor de espalda?

trans-unit.resname:
Include sex/gender, when relevant.Show examples
Sex/Gender helpful:What could cause a lump, the size of a quarter, just under a man’s breast.
Sex/Gender not necessary:What could cause a rubbery bump, the size of a jelly bean, under the skin on the back of my hand?
trans-unit.source:
Include sex/gender, when relevant. Show examples
Sex/Gender helpful: What could cause a lump, the size of a quarter, just under a man’s breast.
Sex/Gender not necessary: What could cause a rubbery bump, the size of a jelly bean, under the skin on the back of my hand?
trans-unit.target:
Incluye sexo/género, cuando sea relevante. Mostrar ejemplos
Sex/Género útil: ¿Qué podría causar una protuberancia, del tamaño de un cuarto, justo debajo del pecho de un hombre?.
Sexo/Género innecesario: ¿Qué podría causar un bulto gomoso, del tamaño de un frijol, debajo de la piel en el reverso de mi mano?

trans-unit.resname:
Include an approximate age.Show examples
Different ages will lead to different answers:For the past 2 days my 15 year old son has had a fever and been limping as if his leg hurts. What are some things that could cause this?
Why has my 3 year old been experiencing some fever and limping as if his leg hurts for the past 2 days?
trans-unit.source:
Include an approximate age. Show examples
Different ages will lead to different answers: For the past 2 days my 15 year old son has had a fever and been limping as if his leg hurts. What are some things that could cause this?
Why has my 3 year old been experiencing some fever and limping as if his leg hurts for the past 2 days?
trans-unit.target:
Incluye edad aproximada Mostrar ejemplos
Diferentes edades pueden llevar a diferentes respuestas: Durante los últimos 2 días mi hijo de 15 años ha tenido fiebre y estado cojeando como si le doliera la pierna. ¿Cuáles son algunas cosas que pueden causar esto?
¿Por qué mi hijo de 3 años ha estado teniendo algo de fiebre y cogiendo como si le doliera la pierna por los últimos 2 días?

trans-unit.resname:
Include weight, height and dosage units, where relevant.Show examples
Good:My son is 3 years old, weights 27 pounds, and is 34 inches tall. Is his size OK for his age?
Not so good:My son is 3, weighs 27, and has a height of 34. Is he OK for his age?
trans-unit.source:
Include weight, height and dosage units, where relevant. Show examples
Good: My son is 3 years old, weights 27 pounds, and is 34 inches tall. Is his size OK for his age?
Not so good: My son is 3, weighs 27, and has a height of 34. Is he OK for his age?
trans-unit.target:
Incluye peso, altura, y unidad de dosis, cuando se relevante. Mostrar ejemplos
Bueno: Mi hijo tiene 3 años, pesa 27 libras, y mide 34 pulgadas. ¿Su tamaño es correcto para su edad?
No tan bueno: Mi hijo tiene 3, pesa 27, y mide 34. ¿Está bien para su edad?

trans-unit.resname:
Please use both brand and generic names for medications, especially if you’re outside of the U.S. or asking about an uncommon medication.Show examples
Good:My son is 5 years old, 55lbs, and has a fever. He took 5ml of Tylenol (acetaminophen120mg/5ml), but his fever persists. Can children of this weight and age take a bigger dose of Tylenol?
Not so good:My son is 5, weighs 55, and has a fever. Tried Tylenol but fever persists. Take more Tylenol?
trans-unit.source:
Please use both brand and generic names for medications, especially if you’re outside of the U.S. or asking about an uncommon medication. Show examples
Good: My son is 5 years old, 55lbs, and has a fever. He took 5ml of Tylenol (acetaminophen120mg/5ml), but his fever persists. Can children of this weight and age take a bigger dose of Tylenol?
Not so good: My son is 5, weighs 55, and has a fever. Tried Tylenol but fever persists. Take more Tylenol?
trans-unit.target:
Por favorm usa nombres de medicamentos de marca y genéricos, especialmente si estás fuera de los EE.UU. o preguntando por un medicamento no común. Mostrar ejemplos
Bueno: Mi hijo de 5 años, 55 lbs, tiene fiebre. Tomó 5ml de Tylenol (acetaminophen120mg/5ml) pero la fiebre persiste. ¿Los niños de su edad pueden tomar una dosis más grande de Tylenol?
No tan bueno: Mi hijo tiene 5, pesa 55, y tiene fiebre. Intenté Tylenol pero la fiebre persiste. ¿Tomar más Tylenol?

trans-unit.resname:
Try to avoid questions that set doctors up for a YES or NO answer.Show examples
Good:How do antibiotics work in young, school-aged children?
Not so good:Do antibiotics work in children?
trans-unit.source:
Try to avoid questions that set doctors up for a YES or NO answer. Show examples
Good: How do antibiotics work in young, school-aged children?
Not so good: Do antibiotics work in children?
trans-unit.target:
Trata de evitar preguntas a las que los doctores puedan responder solo SÍ o NO. Mostrar ejemplos
Bueno: ¿Cómo funcionan los antibióticos en niños jóvenes en edad escolar?
No tan bueno: ¿Los antibióticos funcionan en niños?

trans-unit.resname:
Try to leave opinions out.Show examples
Good:Why are some people against vaccines, when vaccines are used to prevent bad diseases?
Not so good:Are those anti-vaccine folks completely clueless or just in denial?
trans-unit.source:
Try to leave opinions out. Show examples
Good: Why are some people against vaccines, when vaccines are used to prevent bad diseases?
Not so good: Are those anti-vaccine folks completely clueless or just in denial?
trans-unit.target:
Trata de dejar opiniones fuera. Mostrar ejemplos
Bueno: ¿Por qué hay algunas personas en contra de las vacunas, si ayudan a prevenir enfermedades?
No tan bueno: ¿Esas personas antivacunas no tienen ninguna pista al respecto o sólo están negación?

trans-unit.resname:
The clearer, the better. Use good grammar, avoid profanities and stay away from slang.Show examples
Good:I was doing arm curls and felt a burning pain in my biceps. Could I have torn a muscle?
Not so good:Doing curls, felt something and arm hurts?
trans-unit.source:
The clearer, the better. Use good grammar, avoid profanities and stay away from slang. Show examples
Good: I was doing arm curls and felt a burning pain in my biceps. Could I have torn a muscle?
Not so good: Doing curls, felt something and arm hurts?
trans-unit.target:
Entre más claro, mejor. Usa buena gramática, evita blasfemias y mantente lejos de la jerga. Mostrar ejemplos
Bueno: Estaba haciendo curls de bíceps y sentí un dolor quemante en mis bíceps. ¿Podría tener un esguince muscular?
No tan bueno: Haciendo curls, sentí algo y brazo duele?

trans-unit.resname:
Don’t assume personal historical knowledge. HealthTap doctors often will not have seen your previous questions.Show examples
Good:My 2 year old son got ear tubes two months and now has a fever and pus coming from his right ear. Is this common?
Not so good:And it’s been going on for two days, and pus is coming out too?
trans-unit.source:
Don’t assume personal historical knowledge. HealthTap doctors often will not have seen your previous questions. Show examples
Good: My 2 year old son got ear tubes two months and now has a fever and pus coming from his right ear. Is this common?
Not so good: And it’s been going on for two days, and pus is coming out too?
trans-unit.target:
No asumas conocimiento de antecedentes personales. Doctores de HealthTap a menudo no habrán visto tus preguntas previas. Mostrar ejemplos
Bueno: A mi hijo de 2 años le pusieron tubos en los oídos hace 2 meses y ahora tiene fiebre y pus le está saliendo de la oreja derecha. ¿Es común esto?
No tan bueno: Y ya tiene dos días, y está saliendo pus también?

trans-unit.resname:
To maintain privacy, leave your name and the names of others out (unless that “other” is a celebrity who has publicly talked about an issue).Show examples
Good:I just heard the actor Michael J. Fox talk about his Parkinson’s disease. Are there any new, good treatments that have come out in the last 3 years?
Not so good:Hello doctor. My name is John Doe, and I am wondering if there are any good treatments for Parkinson’s disease.
trans-unit.source:
To maintain privacy, leave your name and the names of others out (unless that “other” is a celebrity who has publicly talked about an issue). Show examples
Good: I just heard the actor Michael J. Fox talk about his Parkinson’s disease. Are there any new, good treatments that have come out in the last 3 years?
Not so good: Hello doctor. My name is John Doe, and I am wondering if there are any good treatments for Parkinson’s disease.
trans-unit.target:
Para conservar privacidad, deja fuera tu nombre y los nombres de otros (a menos de que ese “otro” sea una celebridad que haya hablado públicamente acerca de un problema). Mostrar ejemplos
Bueno: Acabo de escuchar al actor Michael J. Fox hablar acerca de su enfermedad de Parkinson. ¿Hay nuevos buenos tratamientos que hayan salido en los últimos 3 años?
No tan bueno: Hola doctor. Mi nombre es John Doe, y me pregunto si hay buenos tratamientos para la enfermedad de Parkinson.

trans-unit.resname:
Avoid using too many abbreviations because these can get downright confusing.Show examples
Good:How do you know if you are pregnant, if you never have regular periods?
Not so good:How do u no ur prego if u never have reg periods?
trans-unit.source:
Avoid using too many abbreviations because these can get downright confusing. Show examples
Good: How do you know if you are pregnant, if you never have regular periods?
Not so good: How do u no ur prego if u never have reg periods?
trans-unit.target:
Evita usar demasiadas abreviaciones porque se pueden poner muy confusas. Mostrar ejemplos
Bueno: ¿Cómo sabes si estás embarazada, si nunca tienes periodos regulares?
No tan buenod: ¿Cómo sabs si stas panzona si nunc tienes priods regus?

trans-unit.resname:
Ask in English. This is the language commonly used by doctors on HealthTap.Show examples
Good:I pruned some trees last weekend and my arm has been hurting for 2 days. Could this be the cause?
Not so good:Porque mi brazo me duele mucho esta semana?
trans-unit.source:
Ask in English. This is the language commonly used by doctors on HealthTap. Show examples
Good: I pruned some trees last weekend and my arm has been hurting for 2 days. Could this be the cause?
Not so good: Porque mi brazo me duele mucho esta semana?
trans-unit.target:
Pregunta en inglés. Este es el idioma comúnmente usado por doctores en HealthTap. Mostrar ejemplos
Bueno: Podé unos árboles el fin de semana pasado y mi brazo me ha estado doliendo por 2 días ¿Podría ser esta la causa?
No tan bueno: Porque mi brazo me duele mucho esta semana?

trans-unit.resname: Dedicated+Add
Calm+Add
Nurturing+Add
Flexible+Add
Inspiring+Add
Dear [Patient name],

I’m happy to share with you that I've found a great new simple and free way to help you live a healthier happier life, and for us to stay connected between visits. Very soon, you will start receiving from me a weekly HealthTap newsletter filled with great pearls of wisdom and beautiful pictures that can help you keep healthy living top of mind.

The newsletter will come from my Virtual Practice on HealthTap - a free web and mobile service that allows you to ask health questions, receive daily health tips, and benefit from the world’s most trustworthy and useful health information written by yours truly and some of the best doctors in the US.
trans-unit.source:
I’m happy to share with you that I've found a great new simple and free way to help you live a healthier happier life, and for us to stay connected between visits. Very soon, you will start receiving from me a weekly HealthTap newsletter filled with great pearls of wisdom and beautiful pictures that can help you keep healthy living top of mind.

The newsletter will come from my Virtual Practice on HealthTap - a free web and mobile service that allows you to ask health questions, receive daily health tips, and benefit from the world’s most trustworthy and useful health information written by yours truly and some of the best doctors in the US.
trans-unit.target:
Estoy feliz de compartirte que he encontrado una nueva, simple, grandiosa y gratuita forma de ayudarte a vivir una vida más feliz y más saludable, y para que podamos mantenernos conectados entre visitas. Muy pronto, recibirás de mi un boletín semanal de HealthTap lleno de grandes perlas de sabiduría y hermosas imágenes que pueden ayudarte a mantener vivir sano como prioridad.

El boletín vendrá de mi Consultorio Virtual en HealthTap – un servicio web y móvil gratuito que te permite hacer preguntas de salud, recibir tips diarios, y beneficiarte de la información más confiable y útil del mundo escrita por mí y algunos de los mejores doctores en EE.UU.

<%= App.settings.server %>/<%= App.user.get('person').profile_name %>

trans-unit.resname:
These terms (the “Free Trial Terms”) govern the offer (the “Prime Free Trial Offer”) by HealthTap to New Qualified Users to access to the HealthTap Prime Service upon signing up and submitting payment information for a new HealthTap Prime account (the “Free Trial Period”). By submitting your payment details, you accept the Prime Free-Trial Offer and: (i) consent to our use of your payment information in accordance with our Payment Details Terms, and (ii) acknowledge and agree to the HealthTapTerms of Useand these Free Trial Terms. If you decide that you do not want to become a paying user of HealthTap Prime under the standard HealthTap Prime Terms in effect at the end of the Free Trial Period, you must cancel your HealthTap Prime Subscription (in the Billing Settings section of your HealthTap accountSettings) before the end of the Free Trial Period. Subscription fees are not prorated; cancellations after the termination of the Free Trial Period will remain active through the end of the trial length period during which the account is canceled. You may only use this Free Trial Offer once. HealthTap reserves the right, in its absolute discretion, to determine individual eligibility for this Prime Free-Trial Offer and to withdraw or to modify this Prime Trial Offer and/or the Free Trial Terms at any time, without prior notice and with no liability.

Payment Details Terms: When you sign up for a trial or any of our Premium Services, or make other purchases through the Apps, your credit card information and other financial data needed to process your payment are collected and stored by third party payment processors, and we may collect some limited information, such as your postal code and transaction history details. The use of your data by any such third party payment processors is subject to their privacy policies. These third parties generally provide us with some limited information (such as a unique token that enables you to make additional purchases using the information they’ve stored, and your card’s type, expiration date, and last four digits).

See the HealthTapTerms of Usefor the definitions of “HealthTap,” “HealthTap Prime,” “Apps,” and “Premium Services.” “New Qualified Users” means new HealthTap Prime customers without a prior primary or sub-account or trial account on HealthTap Prime.

Please note that the following prescriptions are not currently available via HealthTap Prime: narcotics or DEA controlled substances (Schedule I, II, III, IV), psychiatric or lifestyle medications (such as diet or erectile dysfunction drugs), or medications restricted by individual states.
trans-unit.source:
These terms (the “Free Trial Terms”) govern the offer (the “Prime Free Trial Offer”) by HealthTap to New Qualified Users to access to the HealthTap Prime Service upon signing up and submitting payment information for a new HealthTap Prime account (the “Free Trial Period”). By submitting your payment details, you accept the Prime Free-Trial Offer and: (i) consent to our use of your payment information in accordance with our Payment Details Terms, and (ii) acknowledge and agree to the HealthTap Terms of Use and these Free Trial Terms. If you decide that you do not want to become a paying user of HealthTap Prime under the standard HealthTap Prime Terms in effect at the end of the Free Trial Period, you must cancel your HealthTap Prime Subscription (in the Billing Settings section of your HealthTap account Settings) before the end of the Free Trial Period. Subscription fees are not prorated; cancellations after the termination of the Free Trial Period will remain active through the end of the trial length period during which the account is canceled. You may only use this Free Trial Offer once. HealthTap reserves the right, in its absolute discretion, to determine individual eligibility for this Prime Free-Trial Offer and to withdraw or to modify this Prime Trial Offer and/or the Free Trial Terms at any time, without prior notice and with no liability.

Payment Details Terms: When you sign up for a trial or any of our Premium Services, or make other purchases through the Apps, your credit card information and other financial data needed to process your payment are collected and stored by third party payment processors, and we may collect some limited information, such as your postal code and transaction history details. The use of your data by any such third party payment processors is subject to their privacy policies. These third parties generally provide us with some limited information (such as a unique token that enables you to make additional purchases using the information they’ve stored, and your card’s type, expiration date, and last four digits).

See the HealthTap Terms of Use for the definitions of “HealthTap,” “HealthTap Prime,” “Apps,” and “Premium Services.” “New Qualified Users” means new HealthTap Prime customers without a prior primary or sub-account or trial account on HealthTap Prime.

Please note that the following prescriptions are not currently available via HealthTap Prime: narcotics or DEA controlled substances (Schedule I, II, III, IV), psychiatric or lifestyle medications (such as diet or erectile dysfunction drugs), or medications restricted by individual states.
trans-unit.target:
Estos términos (los “Términos de Prueba Gratis”) rigen la oferta (la “Oferta de Prueba Gratis de Prime”) por HealthTap a Usuarios Nuevos Calificados para acceder al Servicio Premium de HealthTap Prime tras registrarse y presentar información de pago para una nueva cuenta de HealthTap Prime (el “Periodo de Prueba Gratis”). Al presentar tus detalles de pago, tú aceptas la Oferta de Prueba Gratis de Prime y: i) consientes a nuestro uso de tu información de pago en cumplimiento con nuestros Términos de Detalles de Pago, y (ii) reconoces y aceptas los Términos de Uso de HealthTap y estos Términos de Prueba Gratis. Si decides que no quieres convertirte en un usuario que paga de HealthTap Prime bajo los Términos estándar de HealthTap Prime en efecto al final del Periodo de Prueba Gratis, tú debes cancelar tu Suscripción a HealthTap Prime (en la sección de Configuración de Facturación de tu cuenta de HealthTap Settings) antes del final del Periodo de Prueba Gratis. Cuotas de suscripción no son prorrateadas; cancelaciones después de la terminación del Periodo de Prueba Gratis permanecerán hasta el final de la duración del periodo de prueba duante el cual la cuenta es cancelada. Solo puedes usar esta Oferta de Prueba Gratis una vez. HealthTap se reserva el derecho, en su absoluta discreción, de determinar la elegibilidad individual para esta Oferta de Prueba Gratis de Prime y de retirar o modificar esta Oferta de Prueba de Prime y/o los Términos de Prueba Gratis en cualquier momento, sin previo aviso y sin responsablidad.

Términos de detalles de pago: Cuando te registras para una prueba o cualquiera de nuestros Servicios Premium, o haces otras compras a través de las Aplicaciones, tu información de tarjeta de crédito y otros datos financieros necesarios para procesar tu pago son recolectados y almacenados por procesadores de pago de tercera parte, y nosotros podemos recolectar información limitada, como tu código postal y detalles de historial de transacción. El uso de tus datos por tales procesadores de pago de tercera parte está sujeto a sus políticas de privacidad. Estas terceras partes generalmente nos brindan un poco de información limitada (como una ficha única que te permite hacer compras adicionales usando la información que han almacenado, y el tipo de tu tarjeta, fecha de vencimiento, y últimos cuatro dígitos).

Ve los Términos de Uso de HealthTap para las definiciones de “HealthTap,” “HealthTap Prime,” “Aplicaciones,” y “Servicios Premium.” “Usuarios Nuevos Calificados” significa los nuevos clientes de HealthTap Prime sin una previa cuenta primaria o subcuenta o cuenta de prueba en HealthTap Prime.

Por favor, nota que las siguientes recetas no estan actualmente disponisbles a través de HealthTap Prime: narcóticos o sustancias controladas por la DEA (Categoría I, II, III, IV), medicamentos psiquiátricos o de estilo de vido (como drogas dietéticas o de disfución eréctil) o medicamentos restringidos por estados individuales.

trans-unit.resname:
When you request to connect with a doctor, we will notify the doctor via email (as available). You will be notified if you are confirmed as this doctor's patient or accepted by the doctor for virtual consults. Please note: doctors do not always receive or respond to these requests, so never delay seeking or receiving care in person as needed.
SeeAdditional Information
trans-unit.source:
When you request to connect with a doctor, we will notify the doctor via email (as available). You will be notified if you are confirmed as this doctor's patient or accepted by the doctor for virtual consults. Please note: doctors do not always receive or respond to these requests, so never delay seeking or receiving care in person as needed.
See Additional Information

Cuando solicitas conectarte con un doctor, le notificaremos al doctor a través de correo electrónico (según esté disponible). Serás notificado si eres confirmado como paciente de este doctor o aceptado por el doctor para consultas virtuales. Por favor, nota: doctores no siempre reciben o responden a estas solicitudes, así que nunca retrases la búsqueda o recepción de atención en persona según sea necesaria.
Ver Información Adicional

trans-unit.resname: Only<span class="dollar-wrap">

RateRx is a new, independent resource for doctors and patients alike, that presents ratings of medication effectiveness as reported by thousands of U.S.-licensed doctors in clinical practice of more than 137 specialties. RateRx represents the first comprehensive assessment of what experienced clinicians in each specialty actually use in the care of patients with specific conditions. Unlike other studies, which may report on the clinical effectiveness of treatments under controlled circumstances, RateRx calls on the deep, long-term, real-world experience of top doctors to reveal which treatments doctors have learned actually work with patients.

Doctors were asked to rate the clinical effectiveness of a drug for treating a condition on a scale of 1 to 5 stars. Contributing doctors gave ratings to medications for their use with specific indications based on their knowledge and were instructed to provide input based only on clinical experience using the drug for that indication. We summarized the combined ratings for each treatment into an aggregate rating reflecting doctors’ collective experiences. The profiles of all doctors who provided ratings are visible to users, who can review details of the doctors’ training and experiences, including their specialties and board certifications.

Participation in this study was open to all U.S.-licensed doctors in good standing. All 66,000 doctors in HealthTap’s Medical Expert Network were encouraged to participate. In addition, HealthTap invited more than 500,000 U.S. licensed doctors in our extended network to participate. Doctors are able to enter effectiveness ratings for medications that treat any condition, and can enter and add ratings for any new medication treatments not already included.

RateRx results display each treatment for an indication in an ordered rank based on average ratings, from highest rated to lowest. When differences between the ratings of alternative treatments are deemed meaningful based on the amount of data presented.

To ensure unbiased doctor evaluations, doctors do not see their colleagues’ existing contributions until after they have entered their own rating. Recommendations cannot be changed once submitted, but after ratings are submitted, doctors can view the ratings of other doctors and comment on these. Both patients and doctors can learn from the RateRx ratings system. Patients benefit from the collective wisdom shared by these doctors, enabling them to see how different treatments for the same conditions are rated and reviewed. Doctors benefit from their colleagues’ ratings and comments, and are able to interpret them by referring to the contributing doctors’ practice profiles (which show their education and experience, their specialty training, years in practice, DocScore, and their “Known for” topics).

Comments, which are optional, are often used by doctors to qualify or explain ratings, or to share details of how medications are used for each indication. Comments are available to read and review, do not change the numeric value of the rating. Ratings are based on generic drug names, but brand names are presented to permit doctors to rate specific drugs. Brand names are shown for every generic medication name presented. This study does not differentiate ratings between different brand names for the same medication. The most common medication treatments for each condition are listed for ratings, but doctors are encouraged to add treatments for any indication, ensuring the inclusion of new or novel treatments for each condition. Doctors were instructed to add medications not previously on the list of standard treatment only if they had experience using the medication to treat the condition at issue and found these medication effective in the treatment of that condition.

Okay
trans-unit.source:
RateRx is a new, independent resource for doctors and patients alike, that presents ratings of medication effectiveness as reported by thousands of U.S.-licensed doctors in clinical practice of more than 137 specialties. RateRx represents the first comprehensive assessment of what experienced clinicians in each specialty actually use in the care of patients with specific conditions. Unlike other studies, which may report on the clinical effectiveness of treatments under controlled circumstances, RateRx calls on the deep, long-term, real-world experience of top doctors to reveal which treatments doctors have learned actually work with patients.

Doctors were asked to rate the clinical effectiveness of a drug for treating a condition on a scale of 1 to 5 stars. Contributing doctors gave ratings to medications for their use with specific indications based on their knowledge and were instructed to provide input based only on clinical experience using the drug for that indication. We summarized the combined ratings for each treatment into an aggregate rating reflecting doctors’ collective experiences. The profiles of all doctors who provided ratings are visible to users, who can review details of the doctors’ training and experiences, including their specialties and board certifications.

Participation in this study was open to all U.S.-licensed doctors in good standing. All 66,000 doctors in HealthTap’s Medical Expert Network were encouraged to participate. In addition, HealthTap invited more than 500,000 U.S. licensed doctors in our extended network to participate. Doctors are able to enter effectiveness ratings for medications that treat any condition, and can enter and add ratings for any new medication treatments not already included.

RateRx results display each treatment for an indication in an ordered rank based on average ratings, from highest rated to lowest. When differences between the ratings of alternative treatments are deemed meaningful based on the amount of data presented.

To ensure unbiased doctor evaluations, doctors do not see their colleagues’ existing contributions until after they have entered their own rating. Recommendations cannot be changed once submitted, but after ratings are submitted, doctors can view the ratings of other doctors and comment on these. Both patients and doctors can learn from the RateRx ratings system. Patients benefit from the collective wisdom shared by these doctors, enabling them to see how different treatments for the same conditions are rated and reviewed. Doctors benefit from their colleagues’ ratings and comments, and are able to interpret them by referring to the contributing doctors’ practice profiles (which show their education and experience, their specialty training, years in practice, DocScore, and their “Known for” topics).

Comments, which are optional, are often used by doctors to qualify or explain ratings, or to share details of how medications are used for each indication. Comments are available to read and review, do not change the numeric value of the rating. Ratings are based on generic drug names, but brand names are presented to permit doctors to rate specific drugs. Brand names are shown for every generic medication name presented. This study does not differentiate ratings between different brand names for the same medication. The most common medication treatments for each condition are listed for ratings, but doctors are encouraged to add treatments for any indication, ensuring the inclusion of new or novel treatments for each condition. Doctors were instructed to add medications not previously on the list of standard treatment only if they had experience using the medication to treat the condition at issue and found these medication effective in the treatment of that condition.

Okay
trans-unit.target:
RateRx es una nueva fuente independiente para doctores y pacientes por igual, que presenta calificaciones de efectividad de medicamentos según reportes de miles de doctores acreditados en los EE.UU. en la práctica clínica de más de 137 especialidades. RateRx representa la primera evaluación completa de lo que clínicos experimentados en cada especialidad realmente usan en la atención de pacientes con condiciones específicas. A diferencia de otros estudios, los cuales podrían reportar la efectividad clínica de tratamientos bajo circunstancias controladas, RateRx llama a la profunda experiencia a largo plazo de los mejores doctores para revelar cuales tratamientos los doctores han aprendido que realmente funcionan con pacientes en el mundo real.

Se les pidió a doctores que calificaran la efectividad clínica de una droga para tratar una condición en una escala de 1 a 5 estrellas. Doctores contribuyentes dan calificaciones a medicamentos por su uso con indicaciones específicas basadas en su conocimiento y fueron instruidos para brindar comentarios basados solo en experiencia clínica usando esa droga para esa indicación. Resumimos las calificaciones combinadas para cada tratamiento en una calificación agregada reflejando las experiencias colectivas de los doctores. Los perfiles de todos los doctores que proporcionaron calificaciones están visibles a usuarios que puede evaluar los detalles del entrenamiento y experiencias de los doctores, incluyendo sus especialidades y certificaciones de consejo.

Participación en este estudio estuvo abierto a todos los doctores acreditados en los EE.UU. con buena reputación. Todos los 66,000 doctores en la Red de Expertos Médicos de HealthTap fueron alentados a participar. Además, HealthTap invitó a más de 500,000 doctores acreditados en los EE.UU. en nuestra red extendida para participar. Doctores son capaces de ingresar calificaciones de efectividad para medicamentos que tratan cualquier condición, y pueden ingresar y agregar calificaciones para cualesquiera tratamientos medicamentosos nuevos que no estén incluidos.

Resultados de RateRx muestran cada tratamiento para una indicación en una clasificación ordenada basada en calificaciones en promedio, de la más alta calificada a la más baja. Cuando se consideren significativas diferencias entre las calificaciones de tratamientos alternativos basadas en la cantidad de datos presentados.

Para asegurar evaluaciones de doctor imparciales, los doctores no pueden ver las contribuciones existentes de sus colegas hasta después de haber ingresado su propia calificación. Las recomendaciones no pueden ser cambiadas una vez presentadas, pero después de que las calificaciones son presentadas, los doctores pueden ver las calificaciones de otros doctores y comentar en ellas. Tanto pacientes como doctores pueden aprender del sistema de calificación de RateRx. Pacientes se benefician de la sabiduría colectiva compartida por estos doctores, permitiéndoles ver como diferentes tratamientos para las mismas condiciones son calificados y evaluados. Doctores se benefician de las calificaciones y comentarios de sus colegas, y son capaces de interpretarlos al referir a los perfiles de consultorio de los doctores contribuyentes (lo cuales muestra su educación y experiencia, su entrenamiento de especialidad, años de práctica, DocScore, y sus temas “Conocido por”).

Comentarios, lo cuales son opcionales, a menudo son usados por doctores para cualificar o explicar calificaciones, o para compartir detalles de cómo medicamentos son usados para cada indicación. Los comentarios están disponibles para lectura y evaluación, no cambian el valor numérico de la calificación. Las calificaciones están basadas en los nombres genéricos de las drogas, pero los nombres de patente están presentados para permitir que doctores califiquen drogas específicas. Nombres de marca se muestran para cada nombre de medicamento genérico presentado. Este estudio no diferencia calificaciones entre diferentes marcas para el mismo medicamento. Los tratamientos medicamentosos más comunes para cada condición están listados por calificación, pero doctores son alentados a añadir tratamientos para cualquier indicación, asegurando la inclusión de nuevos o novedosos tratamientos para cada condición. Se le instruyó a los doctores el añadir medicamentos que no estuvieran previamente en la lista solo si tenían experiencia usando el medicamento para tratar la condición en cuestión, y que hayan encontrado a ese medicamento efectivo en el tratamiento de esa condición.

Okay

trans-unit.resname: Our mission is to measurably prolong the life expectancy of humankind and help everyone Feel Good by providing immediate access to top medical experts and their trusted health advice anytime, anywhere.
trans-unit.source: Our mission is to measurably prolong the life expectancy of humankind and help everyone Feel Good by providing immediate access to top medical experts and their trusted health advice anytime, anywhere.
trans-unit.target: Nuestra misión es prolongar la expectativa de vida de la humanidad de forma cuantificable y ayudar a todos a Sentirse Bien brindándoles acceso inmediato a los mejores expertos médicos y a su confiable consejo de salud a cualquier hora y en cualquier lugar.

trans-unit.resname:
HealthTap has reinvented the way people all over the world take care of their health and well-being, connecting millions everywhere with the most trusted health information and doctors.

Why choose us
With over 2.6 billion answers served from more than 100 specialties, our experts are able to provide the best medical advice for your question. We have the largest doctor network to provide answers, personalized advice, and care for any question.

About our doctors
To become a member of HealthTap’s Medical Expert Network, doctors have to be U.S. board certified, pass a stringent qualification process, and undergo training on how to give helpful advice using our technology platform. We closely monitor user feedback to ensure that our doctors are providing the highest possible care.
trans-unit.source:
HealthTap has reinvented the way people all over the world take care of their health and well-being, connecting millions everywhere with the most trusted health information and doctors.

Why choose us
With over 2.6 billion answers served from more than 100 specialties, our experts are able to provide the best medical advice for your question. We have the largest doctor network to provide answers, personalized advice, and care for any question.

About our doctors
To become a member of HealthTap’s Medical Expert Network, doctors have to be U.S. board certified, pass a stringent qualification process, and undergo training on how to give helpful advice using our technology platform. We closely monitor user feedback to ensure that our doctors are providing the highest possible care.
trans-unit.target:
HealthTap ha reinventado la forma en que gente de todo el mundo cuida de su salud y bienestar, conectando a millones en todas partes con la información de salud y los doctores más confiables.

Por qué elegirnos
Con más de 2,6 billones de respuestas servidas de más de 100 especialidades, nuestros expertos son capaces de brindar el mejor consejo médico para tu pregunta. Tenemos la más grande red de doctores para brindar respuestas, consejo personalizado, y atención para cualquier pregunta.

Acerca de nuestros doctores
Para convertirse en un miembro de la Red de Expertos Médicos de HealthTap, doctores tienen que estar certificados por consejo en los EE.UU., pasar un estricto proceso de calificación, y pasar por entrenamiento sobre cómo dar consejo útil usado nuestra plataforma tecnológica. Monitoreamos de cerca comentarios de usuarios para asegurar que nuestros doctores están brindando la mejor atención posible.

trans-unit.resname: We are offering the patient the option to resume this consult by phone and we may be calling you from 650-620-7086 in the next 2 minutes
trans-unit.source: We are offering the patient the option to resume this consult by phone and we may be calling you from 650-620-7086 in the next 2 minutes
trans-unit.target: Estamos ofreciendo al paciente la opción de continuar esta consulta por teléfono y puede que te llamemos desde 650-520-7086 en los próximos 2 minutos

trans-unit.resname: When you accept a consult, your patient will have the choice of interacting with you via video, voice, or text chat. It’s important to start each consult with a smile. Do whatever you can to make the patient feel comfortable. Practice now by typing a caring chat message below and pressing enter to send.
trans-unit.source: When you accept a consult, your patient will have the choice of interacting with you via video, voice, or text chat. It’s important to start each consult with a smile. Do whatever you can to make the patient feel comfortable. Practice now by typing a caring chat message below and pressing enter to send.
trans-unit.target: Cuando aceptas una consulta, tu paciente tendrá la opción de interactuar contigo a través de chat de texto, video o voz. Es importante empezar cada consulta con una sonrisa. Haz lo que puedas para hacer al paciente sentirse cómodo. Practica ahora escribiendo un mensaje de chat bondadoso abajo y presionando enter para enviar.

trans-unit.resname: All consults will start with a chat message from the patient explaining the reason for the consult.
trans-unit.source: All consults will start with a chat message from the patient explaining the reason for the consult.
trans-unit.target: Todas las consultas empezarán con un mensaje de chat del paciente explicando la razón de la consulta.

trans-unit.resname: I have a skin rash and I’m concerned it might be from food allergies.
trans-unit.source: I have a skin rash and I’m concerned it might be from food allergies.
trans-unit.target: Tengo un sarpullido en la piel y me preocupa que pueda ser de alergias alimentarias.

trans-unit.resname: One of the exciting things about virtual consults is that patients can share photos, test results, or other documents with you.
trans-unit.source: One of the exciting things about virtual consults is that patients can share photos, test results, or other documents with you.
trans-unit.target: Una de las cosas más emocionantes acerca de consultas virtuales es que pacientes pueden compartir fotos, resultados de pruebas, u otros documentos contigo.

trans-unit.resname: In addition to text consults, patients can choose to have video consults. Next we will check if your video is working correctly.
trans-unit.source: In addition to text consults, patients can choose to have video consults. Next we will check if your video is working correctly.
trans-unit.target: Además de consulta de texto, pacientes pueden elegir tener consultas de video. Ahora verificaremos que tu video esté funcionando correctamente.

trans-unit.resname: Click on the different sections below to explore the patient chart. When ready, press the continue button.
trans-unit.source: Click on the different sections below to explore the patient chart. When ready, press the continue button.
trans-unit.target: Haz Clic en las diferentes secciones abajo para explorar la tabla de paciente. Cuando estés listo, presiona el botón de continuar.

trans-unit.resname: Tip: Always explain to the patient when you divert your eyes from the camera to read or type notes. Make them feel comfortable by explaining that this is normal and expected.
trans-unit.source: Tip: Always explain to the patient when you divert your eyes from the camera to read or type notes. Make them feel comfortable by explaining that this is normal and expected.
trans-unit.target: Tip: Siempre explica al paciente cuando apartas la vista de la cámara para leer o escribir notas. Hazlos sentir cómodos explicando que esto es normal y esperado.

trans-unit.resname: Intro consults are a first visit with a prospective patient who is not yet accepted into your practice. Even if you choose not to accept a patient into your practice, you can still offer advice and suggest appropriate follow-up care during the intro consult.
trans-unit.source: Intro consults are a first visit with a prospective patient who is not yet accepted into your practice. Even if you choose not to accept a patient into your practice, you can still offer advice and suggest appropriate follow-up care during the intro consult.
trans-unit.target: Consultas introductorias son una primera visita con un paciente prospectivo que todavía no es aceptado a tu consultorio. Aún si eliges no aceptar un paciente a tu consultorio, todavía puedes ofrecer consejo y sugerir atención de seguimiento apropiado durante la consulta introductoria.

trans-unit.resname: Enter Introductory Consult Notes for the patient. When done, press the continue button.
trans-unit.source: Enter Introductory Consult Notes for the patient. When done, press the continue button.
trans-unit.target: Ingresa Notas de Consulta Introductoria para el paciente. Cuando termines, presiona el botón de continuar.

trans-unit.resname: At any time during the intro consult, you may select the checkmark below the intro consult notes section to accept the patient into your virtual practice. This is a great way to extend your reach and grow your practice!
trans-unit.source: At any time during the intro consult, you may select the checkmark below the intro consult notes section to accept the patient into your virtual practice. This is a great way to extend your reach and grow your practice!
trans-unit.target: En cualquier momento durante la consulta introductoria, puedes seleccionar la marca abajo de la sección de notas de consulta para aceptar al paciente a tu consultorio virtual. ¡Esa es una grandiosa forma de extender tu alcance y crecer tu consultorio!

trans-unit.resname: When you accept a person as a patient, the full SOAP Note displays. To complete your consult, you'll need to complete and submit your summary or SOAP Note. To help you fully understand this form, let's take a tour through each of the sections.
trans-unit.source: When you accept a person as a patient, the full SOAP Note displays. To complete your consult, you'll need to complete and submit your summary or SOAP Note. To help you fully understand this form, let's take a tour through each of the sections.
trans-unit.target: Cuando aceptas una persona como paciente, la Nota SOAP completa se muestra. Para completar tu consulta, necesitarás completar y presentar tu resumen o tu Nota SOAP. Para ayudarte a comprender completamente esta forma, tomemos un tour a través de cada una de las secciones.

trans-unit.resname: When you accept a person as a patient, the full SOAP Note displays. To complete your consult and get paid for the visit, you'll need to complete and submit your summary or SOAP Note. To help you fully understand this form, let's take a tour through each of the sections.
trans-unit.source: When you accept a person as a patient, the full SOAP Note displays. To complete your consult and get paid for the visit, you'll need to complete and submit your summary or SOAP Note. To help you fully understand this form, let's take a tour through each of the sections.
trans-unit.target: Cuando aceptas una persona como paciente, la Nota SOAP completa se muestra. Para completar tu consulta y ser pagado por la visita, necesitarás completar y presentar tu resumen o tu Nota SOAP. Para ayudarte a comprender completamente esta forma, tomemos un tour a través de cada una de las secciones.

trans-unit.resname: Keep it up! You are more than half way done. Subjective, Objective, and Assessment sections are where you can enter text freely about the visit.
trans-unit.source: Keep it up! You are more than half way done. Subjective, Objective, and Assessment sections are where you can enter text freely about the visit.
trans-unit.target: ¡Continúa! Ya llevas más de la mitad. Las secciones de Subjetivo, Objetivo, y Análisis son donde puedes ingresar texto libremente acerca de la consulta.

trans-unit.resname: The Plan section has several structured elements to help your patient follow through with your recommendations.
trans-unit.source: The Plan section has several structured elements to help your patient follow through with your recommendations.
trans-unit.target: La sección de Plan tiene varios elementos estructurados para ayudar a tu paciente a seguir adelante con tus recomendaciones.

trans-unit.resname: This is where you can really help your patient! You’ll notice that you can add as many recommended actionable steps or follow-up care instructions. Make sure you have at least one. You can also turn any recommendation into a helpful regular reminder with just a few clicks.
trans-unit.source: This is where you can really help your patient! You’ll notice that you can add as many recommended actionable steps or follow-up care instructions. Make sure you have at least one. You can also turn any recommendation into a helpful regular reminder with just a few clicks.
trans-unit.target: ¡Aquí es donde realmente puedes ayudar a tu paciente! Te darás cuenta que puedes agregar tantos pasos de acción recomendados o instrucciones de atención de seguimiento. Asegúrate que tienes al menos uno. Puedes también convertir cualquier recomendación en un recordatorio útil y regularlo con sólo unos clics.

trans-unit.resname: Go ahead and give it a try. For example, recommend a 30-minute walk, once a day, for a month.
trans-unit.source: Go ahead and give it a try. For example, recommend a 30-minute walk, once a day, for a month.
trans-unit.target: Ve e inténtalo. Por ejemplo, recomienda una caminata de 30 minutos, una vez al día, por un mes.

trans-unit.resname: One of the things patients really appreciate is that you can prescribe medications that are sent directly to a patient's indicated pharmacy. For patients located outside of the U.S, you can recommend medications.
trans-unit.source: One of the things patients really appreciate is that you can prescribe medications that are sent directly to a patient's indicated pharmacy. For patients located outside of the U.S, you can recommend medications.
trans-unit.target: Una de las cosas que los pacientes realmente aprecian es que puedas recetar medicamentos que son enviados directamente a la farmacia indicada de tu paciente. Para pacientes localizados fuera de los EE.UU. puedes recomendar medicamentos.

trans-unit.resname: Another new functionality, that delights and saves patients time is the ability for you to order lab tests virtually. The lab order will be sent to the Quest Service Center the patient chooses. Once the patient has been tested you will be sent the results for review.
trans-unit.source: Another new functionality, that delights and saves patients time is the ability for you to order lab tests virtually. The lab order will be sent to the Quest Service Center the patient chooses. Once the patient has been tested you will be sent the results for review.
trans-unit.target: Otra nueva funcionalidad, que encanta y ahorra tiempo a pacientes es la habilidad que tienes de ordenar pruebas de laboratorio virtualmente. La orden de laboratorio será enviada al Centro Quest Service que el paciente escoja. Una vez que al paciente se le ha tomado la prueba se te enviarán los resultados para revisión.

trans-unit.resname: Simply start typing to see the options of more than 2,000 lab tests you can order.
trans-unit.source: Simply start typing to see the options of more than 2,000 lab tests you can order.
trans-unit.target: Simplemente empieza escribiendo para ver las opciones de más de 2,000 pruebas de laboratorio que puedes ordenar.

trans-unit.resname: To suggest a follow-up appointment, include when the patient should schedule the appointment and, optionally, what the purpose of the follow-up is. The patient will receive a link to easily schedule the appointment.
trans-unit.source: To suggest a follow-up appointment, include when the patient should schedule the appointment and, optionally, what the purpose of the follow-up is. The patient will receive a link to easily schedule the appointment.
trans-unit.target: Para sugerir una cita de seguimiento, incluye cuándo debe el paciente agendar la cita y, opcionalmente, cuál es el propósito del seguimiento. El paciente recibirá un enlace para agendar fácilmente la cita.

trans-unit.resname: You can refer your patients to any doctor within or outside the HealthTap network. Alternatively, refer a specialty and we’ll provide a list of specialists for your patient to choose from.
trans-unit.source: You can refer your patients to any doctor within or outside the HealthTap network. Alternatively, refer a specialty and we’ll provide a list of specialists for your patient to choose from.
trans-unit.target: Puedes recomendar a tus pacientes a cualquier doctor dentro o fuera de la red HealthTap. Alternativamente, recomienda a una especialidad y nosotros proporcionaremos una lista de especialistas para que tu paciente escoja.

trans-unit.resname: Tip: We recommend you refer patients to doctors who participate in HealthTap Concierge so your patients can get immediate follow-up care. Concierge doctors will be indicated with a small green dot and labeled "Available for Virtual Consults".
trans-unit.source: Tip: We recommend you refer patients to doctors who participate in HealthTap Concierge so your patients can get immediate follow-up care. Concierge doctors will be indicated with a small green dot and labeled "Available for Virtual Consults".
trans-unit.target: Tip: Te recomendamos que recomiendes a tus pacientes doctores que participan en HealthTap Concierge para que tus pacientes puedan obtener atención de seguimiento. Doctores Concierge serán indicados con un pequeño punto verde y etiquetados “Disponible para Consultas Virtuales”.

trans-unit.resname: Checklists are recommended actions that help your patient achieve a health goal or feel better. Patients receive timely reminders for each to-do on the list. You can browse through a wealth of checklists that doctors on HealthTap have created by topic and choose the best one for your patient.
trans-unit.source: Checklists are recommended actions that help your patient achieve a health goal or feel better. Patients receive timely reminders for each to-do on the list. You can browse through a wealth of checklists that doctors on HealthTap have created by topic and choose the best one for your patient.
trans-unit.target: Listados son acciones recomendadas que ayudan a tu paciente a lograr una meta de salud o sentirse mejor. Pacientes reciben recordatorios oportunos para cada quehacer en la lista, Puedes ojear a través de una riqueza de listados que doctores en HealthTap han creado por tema y elegir el mejor para tu paciente.

trans-unit.resname: Patients see the SOAP notes you enter. If you wish to add notes only visible to doctors, please include them in the Additional Chart Notes section.
trans-unit.source: Patients see the SOAP notes you enter. If you wish to add notes only visible to doctors, please include them in the Additional Chart Notes section.
trans-unit.target: Los pacientes ven las notas SOAP que ingresas. Si deseas agregar notas sólo visibles para doctores, por favor, inclúyelas en la sección Notas Adicionales de Tabla

trans-unit.resname: In the unlikely event that the consult cannot be completed successfully or the patient behaves inappropriately, please flag the consult. This notifies us and ends the consult. Always inform your patient before you press the flag, as it will end the consult. Go ahead, try it now.
trans-unit.source: In the unlikely event that the consult cannot be completed successfully or the patient behaves inappropriately, please flag the consult. This notifies us and ends the consult. Always inform your patient before you press the flag, as it will end the consult. Go ahead, try it now.
trans-unit.target: En el poco probable caso de que la consulta no pueda ser completada exitosamente o el paciente se comporte inapropiadamente, por favor, marca la consulta. Esto nos notifica y termina la consulta. Siempre informa a tu paciente antes de presionar la marca, ya que terminará la consulta. Ve e inténtalo ahora.

trans-unit.resname: When you click the 'Send & End Consult' button, the consult will end and your SOAP Note will be sent to the patient and become a part of their Patient's Chart. You can ask your patient to end the consult on their end so that you can take a few minutes to finish your SOAP Note. Then click this button when you are done.
trans-unit.source: When you click the 'Send & End Consult' button, the consult will end and your SOAP Note will be sent to the patient and become a part of their Patient's Chart. You can ask your patient to end the consult on their end so that you can take a few minutes to finish your SOAP Note. Then click this button when you are done.
trans-unit.target: Cuando haces clic en el botón ‘Enviar y Terminar Consulta’, la consulta terminará y tu Nota SOAP será enviada al paciente y se convertirá en una parte de su Tabla de Paciente. Puedes pedir a tu paciente que termine la consulta en su fin para que puedas tomarte algunos minutos para terminar to Nota SOAP. Entonces haz clic en este botón cuando estés listo.

trans-unit.resname: Tip: Please remember to always start and finish every consult with a smile and warm greetings. When ending a consult, show patients that you care by asking if there's anything else you can do to help them.
trans-unit.source: Tip: Please remember to always start and finish every consult with a smile and warm greetings. When ending a consult, show patients that you care by asking if there's anything else you can do to help them.
trans-unit.target: Tip: Por favor, recuerda siempre empezar y terminar cada consulta con una sonrisa y saludos cálidos. Cuando termines una consulta, muéstrale a tus pacientes que te interesan preguntándoles si hay algo más que puedas hacer para ayudarlos,

trans-unit.resname: (Note: in an actual consult, this would trigger your earnings to go into your account, which gets disbursed monthly)
trans-unit.source: (Note: in an actual consult, this would trigger your earnings to go into your account, which gets disbursed monthly)
trans-unit.target: (Nota: en una consulta real, esto puede aumentar las ganancias que van a tu cuenta, las cuales se pagan mensualmente)

trans-unit.resname: It seems our plugin does not have permission to load in your browser. {link_tag_start}Click here{link_tag_end} to learn how to enable this.
trans-unit.source: It seems our plugin does not have permission to load in your browser. {link_tag_start}Click here{link_tag_end} to learn how to enable this.
trans-unit.target: Parece que nuestro complemento no tiene permiso de cargar en tu navegador. {link_tag_start}Haz clic aquí{link_tag_end} para aprender cómo habilitar esto.

trans-unit.resname: Do you see yourself? If not, click the white gear icon on the bottom left to check your camera settings.
trans-unit.source: Do you see yourself? If not, click the white gear icon on the bottom left to check your camera settings.
trans-unit.target: ¿Te ves a ti mismo? Si no es así, haz clic en el engrane blanco en la izquierda inferior para revisar la configuración de la cámara.

trans-unit.resname: Do you see yourself? If not, click the white gear icon on the top left to check your camera settings.
trans-unit.source: Do you see yourself? If not, click the white gear icon on the top left to check your camera settings.
trans-unit.target: ¿Te ves a ti mismo? Si no es así, haz clic en el engrane blanco en la izquierda superior para revisar la configuración de la cámara.

trans-unit.resname: If you need additional support, please contact your IT department.
trans-unit.source: If you need additional support, please contact your IT department.
trans-unit.target: Si necesitas ayuda adicional, por favor, contacta tu departamento IT.

trans-unit.resname: If you need additional support, please email {email_link_tag_start}{email}{link_tag_end} or call us at {phone}.
trans-unit.source: If you need additional support, please email {email_link_tag_start}{email}{link_tag_end} or call us at {phone}.
trans-unit.target: Si necesitas ayuda adicional, por favor, envía un correo a {email_link_tag_start}{email}{link_tag_end} o llámanos al {phone}.

trans-unit.resname: It seems like you are still having issues granting permission to the plug-in. Don't worry, continue now and someone from our team will call you later to help you set up your plug-in.
trans-unit.source: It seems like you are still having issues granting permission to the plug-in. Don't worry, continue now and someone from our team will call you later to help you set up your plug-in.
trans-unit.target: Parece que sigues teniendo problemas dando permiso al complemento. No te preocupes, continúa ahora y alguien de nuestro equipo te llamará para ayudarte a establecer tu complemento.

trans-unit.resname: • Same day appointment reminders are sent by SMS
trans-unit.source: • Same day appointment reminders are sent by SMS
trans-unit.target: • Recordatorios del mismo día son enviados por SMS

trans-unit.resname: Here are a few additional facts you should know: • Patients schedule appointments during your virtual office hours • Your next day’s schedule is sent by email at 9pm{appointments}
trans-unit.source: Here are a few additional facts you should know: • Patients schedule appointments during your virtual office hours • Your next day’s schedule is sent by email at 9pm{appointments}
trans-unit.target: Aquí hay algunos datos adicionales que debes saber: •Pacientes agendan citas durante tu horario de oficina virtual • Tu horario del día siguiente es enviado por correo electrónico a las 9pm {appointments}

trans-unit.resname: Just like you're available when your real {clinic_slash}office is open, it's important that you're online and available during your designated Virtual Office Hours. Patients may be looking for you at these times. You do not have to be at your desk, simply sign in and set yourself as “available” on the HealthTap for Doctors mobile app. The app will ring when your patient calls.
trans-unit.source: Just like you're available when your real {clinic_slash}office is open, it's important that you're online and available during your designated Virtual Office Hours. Patients may be looking for you at these times. You do not have to be at your desk, simply sign in and set yourself as “available” on the HealthTap for Doctors mobile app. The app will ring when your patient calls.
trans-unit.target: Justo como cuando estás disponible cuando tu oficina {clinic_slash}real está abierta, es importante que estés en línea y disponible durante tu Horario de Oficina Virtual designado, Pacientes pueden estar buscándote en estos horarios. No tienes que estar en tu escritorio, simplemente regístrate y ponte como “disponible” en la aplicación móvil HealthTap para Doctores. La aplicación sonará cuando tu paciente llame.

trans-unit.resname: Tip: The HealthTap for Doctors app is available to download for free on any mobile device or tablet for iOS and Android. You can start consults on your mobile device. At any time, you can continue the consult on your computer by going to your logged in homepage.
trans-unit.source: Tip: The HealthTap for Doctors app is available to download for free on any mobile device or tablet for iOS and Android. You can start consults on your mobile device. At any time, you can continue the consult on your computer by going to your logged in homepage.
trans-unit.target: Tip: La aplicación HealthTap for Doctors está disponible para descargar gratis desde cualquier dispositivo móvil o tableta para iOS y Android. Puedes empezar consultas en tu dispositivo móvil. En cualquier momento, puedes continuar la consulta en tu computadora yendo a tu página de inicio ingresada.

trans-unit.resname: You can set your shifts at your convenience, and you can change them at any time by clicking "Shift Schedule."
trans-unit.source: You can set your shifts at your convenience, and you can change them at any time by clicking "Shift Schedule."
trans-unit.target: Puedes establecer turnos a tu conveniencia, y puedes cambiarlos en cualquier momento haciendo clic en “Horario de Turno.”

trans-unit.resname: You can set your virtual office hours at your convenience, and you can change them at any time. You can update your virtual office hours, set vacation days, and choose "unavailable" times by clicking "Practice Hours."
trans-unit.source: You can set your virtual office hours at your convenience, and you can change them at any time. You can update your virtual office hours, set vacation days, and choose "unavailable" times by clicking "Practice Hours."
trans-unit.target: Puedes establecer tu horario de oficina virtual a tu conveniencia, y puedes cambiarlas en cualquier momento, Puedes actualizar tu oficina virtual horario, establecer días de vacaciones, y escoger horas “no disponibles” haciendo clic “Horario de Consultorio”

trans-unit.resname: In addition to live virtual consults, you will also receive Inbox Consults. These are paid, detailed messages from your patients that appear at the top of your homepage feed and must be answered within 24 hours. You will earn $30 when you complete patient consults and submit your SOAP Note.
trans-unit.source: In addition to live virtual consults, you will also receive Inbox Consults. These are paid, detailed messages from your patients that appear at the top of your homepage feed and must be answered within 24 hours. You will earn $30 when you complete patient consults and submit your SOAP Note.
trans-unit.target: Además de consultas virtuales en vivo, también recibirás Consultas de Buzón de Entrada. Estos son mensajes detallados pagados de tus pacientes que aparecen en la parte superior del feed de tu página de inicio y deben de ser contestadas en 24 horas. Ganarás $30 cuando completes consultas de pacientes y envíes tu nota SOAP/

trans-unit.resname: Inbox Consults are detailed questions from your patients that appear at the top of your homepage feed and must be answered within 24 hours. You can send clarification questions and have a conversation with the patients. To end the consult, simply submit the SOAP note.
